lines.text: I'm askin' ya, where's that squealin' son of yours?
You think a squealer can get away from me? Huh?
You know what I do to squealers? I let 'em have it in the belly, so they can roll around for a long time thinkin' it over. You're worse than him, tellin' me he's comin' back? Ya lyin' old hag!
I wouldn't give you the skin off a grape.
"Very sorry." No prejudice, of course, but no job either. So this is how Nick went Christmas shopping for his kids.
What happened? You came here to tell me what happened. Why did you change your mind? Scared of hurting me? Look, Nettie... I'm the kind of guy you can't hurt. It doesn't matter.
